diff_analysis.evidence: The new code adds explicit upper bounds checks on packet lengths (len > MAX_CAPACITY, len >= MAX_CAPACITY, out_len + len > MAX_CAPACITY) and on Argon2 parameters (t, p, and memory m limited by ARGON2_MEMORY_LIMIT_KIB). These changes reduce risk of oversized allocations and excessive memory usage. No new out-of-bounds reads/writes, unchecked buffer copies, unbounded allocations, or NULL dereferences are introduced by the added code.
